drugs.usualDose: Loading Dose: 5-6mg/kg at rate of lean body weight. Maintenancae dose varies by patien population.
drugs.preperation: Standard concentration 500mg in 500 ml D5W or NS(1mg/ml

drugs.stickers: Do not Refreigerate, Do not Tube, Must be filtereds
drugs.specialComments: Send with 0.2 micron in line filter No.12273-48, Amiodarone is incompatible in NS
